name: 王泰典
objective: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義，期使同學有正確的認知與基本的操作技巧。
schedule:
W01-02: Introduction to differential equations
W02-04: First-order differential equations
W04/05: Midterm #1
W05-09: Higher-order differentail equations
W09/10: Midterm #2
W10-12: The Laplace transform
W12/13: Midterm #3
W13-15: Series Solutions of linear differential equations
W15/16: Numerical solutions of ordinary differential equations
W16-17: Vectors
W18: Final
scorePolicy:
Midterms and final exam.: 80%
Attendant and respondence: 20%
materials: Kreyszig, E. (2006), Advanced engineering mathematics, 9th edtion, Jones and Bartlett Publishers, 歐亞書局代理。
